alpha-2.2.3.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.3
content: - Hotkeys 'm' for map and 'p' for profile
- Admins and moderators name now displays a different colour

alpha-2.2.4.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.4
content: - Map updates and loading time improvements
- Armour and weapon stats for all items
- Added default price to majority of items

alpha-2.2.5.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.5
content: - Fixes health bar resetting when logging out
- Minor fixes to the UI animations
- Respawn duration changes to Skeleton King and Ogre Lord
- A lot of game engine improvements and preparations for new content ;)

alpha-2.2.6.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.6
content: - Added stop movement by pressing ESC
- Added attack last target by pressing 't'
- Client backend work, support for special effects and more

alpha-2.2.7.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.7
content: - Adds 'h' as the hotkey for healing (will use first potion in inventory)
- Trees now indicate level required to chop
- Improvements to the backend and interactions with the map

alpha-2.3.1.title: Kaetram alpha-2.3.1
content: - Added special effects to some projectiles
- Fixes a bug with the overlay sizing
- New caching system for the client map

alpha-2.3.2.title: Kaetram alpha-2.3.2
content: - Fixes mobs being unattackable after they moved
- Mob position sync when returning to game tab (browsers)
- Fix bug with combat continuing after closing the game

alpha-2.3.3.title: Kaetram alpha-2.3.3
content: - Added support for in-game special ranks
- Added new quests, bosses, weapons, rings, pendants, and areas
- Fixes to disconnection issues due to high-latency
- Fixes and updates to multiple interfaces
- Improvements to clicking moving mobs and ranged combat
- Combat formula and defense stats of mobs updated
- Support for multiple game worlds now completed

alpha-2.3.4.title: Kaetram alpha-2.3.4
content: - Right-click interaction with mobs and items
- Fixes bug where items would disappear when unequipping
- Fixes and improvements to the user interface

alpha-2.3.5.title: Kaetram alpha-2.3.5
content: - Added shared exp (based on damage contributions to mob)
- Added priority drops (whoever does most damage has priority to an item)
- Tweaked item prices, drop rates, stats, and descriptions
- Bank is now stackable for all items
- Various bug fixes and backend improvements

alpha-2.4.0.title: Kaetram alpha-2.4.0
content: - Added Defense skill, attack styles, and secret achievements
- Added freezing effect and snow potion functionality
- Added PVP areas, new quests, and new areas
- Experience gain is now on a per-hit basis
- New interfaces for profile, skills, and friends list
- Loads of backend improvements and optimizations
